name: Pachinko 365 Nichi
overview:
Pachinko game from SeTa, which was released only in Japan.

The game includes three game modes. Main mode, where you start with 30,000 yen in your pocket and choose one of the three different pachinko parlours to play on. Then there's Free Mode, where you can play different pachinko machines with unlimited supply of balls. Lastly, there's a split screen VS mode against CPU or another human player with a 3 minute time limit.
